summary: This document is an email chain and memo regarding coordination between attorney Jeanne Christensen and the District Attorney's Office of New York (DANY) and the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York (USAO SDNY) to schedule an interview with Christensen's client, who appears to be a potential witness or victim in an investigation related to Leon Black. The communications discuss overcoming a language barrier and tentatively scheduling an interview for May 18, 2021.

persons.name: Jeanne Christensen
persons.context: Attorney representing a client with information relevant to an investigation, coordinating with prosecutors to schedule an interview.

persons.name: Leon Black
persons.context: Mentioned as having made a media statement which prompted attorney Jeanne Christensen to contact the District Attorney's Office.

connections.description: Christensen contacted prosecutors after Black made a media statement, suggesting her client may have information relevant to an investigation involving Black.

events.title: Attorney Contacts DANY After Leon Black Statement
events.description: Attorney Jeanne Christensen contacted the District Attorney's Office of New York (DANY) after Leon Black made a media statement, inquiring if they were investigating.

events.title: Tentative Interview Scheduled
events.description: A tentative interview was scheduled between prosecutors and Jeanne Christensen's client for Tuesday, May 18, 2021, at 1:00 PM.

locations: One Saint Andrew's Plaza, New York, NY 10007
keyFacts: Attorney Jeanne Christensen contacted the District Attorney's Office of New York (DANY) in April 2021 after Leon Black made a media statement.
DANY suggested Christensen contact the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York (USAO SDNY) regarding her client's information.
Christensen's client required an interpreter due to a language barrier for the proposed interview with prosecutors.
An interview between prosecutors and Christensen's client was tentatively scheduled for May 18, 2021.
